channel.title: 🙂  Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API
channel.description: Recent content in 🙂  Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API

item.title: GET `/faces`
item.description: Use this endpoint to find which Twemojis are supported as faces. Knowing whether a Twemoji is supported as a face can help in formulating other requests that don't fail. Arguments Name Required Type Default twemoji_version ❌ String 13.1.0 Chart.platform.disableCSSInjection = true; function getCanvas(id){ return document.

item.title: GET `/faces/features`
item.description: Use this endpoint to view the layers of Twemojis that are supported as faces indexed by features. Arguments Name Required Type Default twemoji_version ❌ String 13.1.0 Chart.platform.disableCSSInjection = true; function getCanvas(id){ return document.getElementById(id) }; var dataTally = ["1"].map(value = parseInt(value)); var labels = ["

item.title: GET `/faces/layers`
item.description: Use this endpoint to view the features of Twemojis that are supported as faces indexed by layers. Arguments Name Required Type Default twemoji_version ❌ String 13.1.0 Chart.platform.disableCSSInjection = true; function getCanvas(id){ return document.getElementById(id) }; var dataTally = ["1"].map(value = parseInt(value)); var labels = ["

item.title: GET `/faces/{base_emoji}`
item.description: Use this endpoint to build a custom Twemoji using one as a base. Arguments Name Required Type Default base_emoji ✅ String none head ❌ String base emoji cheeks ❌ String base emoji mouth ❌ String base emoji nose ❌ String base emoji eyes ❌ String base emoji eyewear ❌ String base emoji headwear ❌ String base emoji other ❌ String base emoji order ❌ String head,cheeks,mouth,nose,eyes,eyewear,headwear,other output ❌ String JSON file_format ❌ String SVG renderer ❌ String N/A due to SVG file format size ❌ Integer N/A due to SVG file format padding ❌ Integer 0 background_color ❌ String transparent filename ❌ String key-value pairs twemoji_version ❌ String 13.
